features.featureTitle: After the user clicks the “Yes” button in frontend/index.html, display the uploaded image (IMG_20221213_093702.jpg) in a small persistent frame fixed to the bottom-right corner of the screen. The frame must remain visible for the rest of the session (no auto-dismiss). The image display must be separate from (not inside) the existing buttons/messages area.

Add background music playback in frontend/index.html using the previously uploaded “forever” song file from this chat. Music must start only after explicit user interaction (use the existing tap-to-start / intro interaction) and then play as background music while the page is open.
